alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 2:06PM EDT until July 25 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ulster County in east central New York... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 206 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kerhonkson, or near Ellenville, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tillson, High Falls, Kerhonkson, Olivebridge, Rosendale, Marbletown, Port Ben, Lefever Falls, Maple Hill, Atwood, Liebhardt, Fantinekill, Hickorybush, Alligerville, Lake Minnewaska, Stone Ridge, Granite, Creeklocks, Mombaccus and Rosendale Village. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
